column3: Nice. For some reason I thought we already had this. Concept ACK.

Travis failure:

    self.nodes[0].assert_start_raises_init_error(['-conf=' + conf_file], 'Error reading configuration file: specified data directory "' + new_data_dir + '" does not exist.')

I have no idea how to fix the broken functional test cross platform without removing it.\n\nClosing as "up for grabs".
Let's remove it then. I prefer having this test, TBH.
